title: If a time machine took you back to the Stone Age, what would you do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since our perceptions of human beings during a time before we started getting lost in our own heads, where our pre-sapian ancestors, were prabably more gentle and easy going then us technologically infected,growth hormone infested, (testosterone driven, roid-rage cases and Estrogen Overload fem-roids, both genders more lost in a “primal procreation fixation” mentality, due to synthetically over produced, over stimulated, overmedicated, muscles heads and sexaholics, guys who can shoot greater volumes of seminal fluids with fewer numbers of fertal,gene- recesive free spermatozoa, which still increases the chance of female. conception when females participating in experimental fertility treatments with drug- tweeking ovular receptivity to a ----blabla!!A guy could have five health sperm to his name after allthe crap that grows muscles and shrinks boyparts, andend up with five children in nine months when his mates overies are sick an damb tired of waiting passively for the determined sperm suitors to come a callin. “Hey!!! You!!! Nancy boy!!! Get your squigly little butt over hear!!! Or would you rather be emasculated out there in front of you for other Buddies either way the flies with you me and my sisters b**** is now get over here and help us make babies. ---My game plan, if I am one of several examples of modern-demestic monstrosities, unable to convince our gentler, more primative ancestors that some of us frontal lobe enhanced, procreation obsessed, impulse control impaired beast from thier children's future, are rational, stable, and safe to be near, my only course of action is to break out the brewskies, pack some bowl9vto be passed around and inhaled, put some 80s heavy metal music on full blast, and bring our primitive, innocent cave men and women into modern man- cave, she-shed reasoning, to bring them over to the dark side of humanity right away, to prevent any prehistoric party poopers from the total square side of the Force, from killing my buzz. Party on, old cave dweller dudes and babes!!!

Make friends with a band of hunter-gatherers. Weedle my way into the band, because alone i will surely die. Stone age (Paleolithic) communities were based on cooperation both within the band and with bands they came in contact with. Stone age people knew that their best strategy for survival was not to compete with other bands (war) but to cooperate. Also, the earth was so sparsely populated at that time (it’s estimated that 25,000 years ago there were no more than 150,000 people in ALL of Africa) that competition, either within or across groups, with its probability of injury or death, wasn’t an option. So, back to your question. I would join the first band that would have me. I would be as kind and helpful as possible to guarantee that i would always have a place in the band.
